summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program Year January 1, 1987 through December 31, 1987, accepting financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; appropriating these funds and program income received into the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; abandoning certain unexpended unencumbered balances in previous project appropriations; authorizing implementation of certain projects by the Department of Administrative Services, Department of Community Development, Department of Human Resources, and the Seattle-King County Health Department, and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
